description:
UPDATE : OVER 1400 STUDENTS HAVE JOINED THIS COURSE !

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

If you want to go from total beginner to creating awesome badge logos , using simple techniques , then this course is for you !

This course takes you step by step , starting at the very beginning , teaching you the needed skills to create your own badge logo designs , with easy , yet effective techniques to creating all the parts of a badge logo .

This course was created while keeping in mind providing students with a simple , comprehensive , engaging curriculum , in high quality video tutorials .

Start With Learning The Needed Basics Of Adobe Illustrator

Even if you are an absolute beginner , learning the basic skills you need to know in Adobe Illustrator is included in this course .

Create Different Types Of Badge Logo Containers And Combine Them Any Way You Like

You will learn different methods to create different types of badge logo containers , and how to control the properties and appearance of those containers , and then choose your combination of containers and arrange them any way you want , into a polished badge logo .

A Creativity Guide E-Book Is Included To Boost Your Creativity Even More

This downloadable e-book , created especially for this course and attached to this course contains useful examples , reminders , and pointers , that will help you greatly .

Get A Ready-For-Use Adobe Illustrator Symbol Graphics Library For More Decoration

This downloadable symbol library contains 65 symbol graphics , created for you to further decorate your badge logo designs with customizable symbol graphics .
title: How Design a Logo - a Beginners Course
